title: Add and enhance Saarumathi.A's photo on TeamMembersPage

requirements.summary: Integrate the enhanced profile photo of Saarumathi.A as a static asset in the frontend
acceptanceCriteria: The enhanced photo file saarumathi-profile-enhanced.jpg is present in frontend/public/assets/generated/
The image is visually enhanced (improved brightness, contrast, and sharpness) compared to the raw upload

file_operations.description: Add the enhanced portrait photo of Saarumathi.A as a static asset. This file is generated from IMG_20260226_111401.jpg with enhanced brightness, contrast, sharpness, and skin tone clarity, cropped to focus on face and upper body with a clean, professional look. Use the workspace file path frontend/public/assets/generated/saarumathi-profile-enhanced.dim_400x500.jpg to reference this asset in the UI.

requirements.summary: Display Saarumathi.A's enhanced profile photo in the TeamMembersPage carousel slide
acceptanceCriteria: Saarumathi.A's carousel slide shows her enhanced photo instead of initials fallback
The photo is displayed clearly with proper cropping/framing (face and upper body visible)
The photo container uses the same glassmorphic card styling as Naveen.V's slide
No layout shift or sizing inconsistency between the two team member slides

file_operations.description: Update the team member data for Saarumathi.A to reference the enhanced profile photo at frontend/public/assets/generated/saarumathi-profile-enhanced.dim_400x500.jpg. Replace the current photo value (sarumathi-profile.dim_400x400.png) with the new enhanced image path. Ensure the photo is displayed inside the same glassmorphic card styling used for Naveen.V's profile slide, with proper image cropping/framing to show face and upper body clearly. Do not alter the carousel structure, animation logic, or slide layout beyond updating the photo source for Saarumathi.A.
